mapper.insert: insert into berp(workId, workName, workPreName, workNo, workCond, workItem, workTel, workFax, workAddr, workManName, workManEmail, workManTel) VALUES (#{workId}, #{workName}, #{workPreName}, #{workNo}, #{workCond}, #{workItem}, #{workTel}, #{workFax}, #{workAddr}, #{workManName}, #{workManEmail}, #{workManTel});
